document.full_text: italians began voting for a second and final day on monday in local elections that will test whether a sex scandal, three corruption trials and a faltering economy have weakened prime minister silvio berlusconi.
document.title: local polls a test for scandal-hit berlusconi
lines_and_colors: italians began voting for a second and final day on monday in local elections that will test whether a sex scandal, three corruption trials and a faltering economy have weakened prime minister silvio berlusconi.
